altername_name: Ryōri no Tetsujin: Kitchen Stadium Tour
name: Ryouri no Tetsujin: Kitchen Stadium Tour
overview: Ryouri no Tetsujin: Kitchen Stadium Tour is an interactive multimedia experience based on the popular television show known internationally as Iron Chef. The main feature is a full-3D recreation of the show's "Kitchen Stadium" set, which the player can walk around freely. By interacting with various portraits or objects, the player can view interview clips with the cast and staff, see short clips from the show, and learn more about the contestants and the equipment used in the kitchen. There is also a museum mode that shows winning contestants from the show along with their dishes and ingredients, and other various memorable clips from the show. Last, there is a quiz mode that tests the player's knowledge of the show with 50 multiple-choice questions.
